title: CrownCruiser eBike boasts Bafang Motor, Gates Carbon Drive and front suspension
content:
The CrownCruiser is a wild-looking creation; the latest in a series of eBikes that look to blend the suspension of off-road bikes with the slicker tires and relaxed upright riding position of a city cruiser, with a motor, of course. CrownCruiser eBike The CrownCruiser eBike is something of a hybrid two-wheeled vehicle; it could, theoretically,
